description: This file is a configuration include file for setting up machine-specific and CPU-specific tuning parameters for the 'cortexa32' CPU in the build system, likely related to Yocto or BitBake build environment. It defines tuning features, compiler arguments, and package architectures for this specific CPU.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: A utility method used to check if a list or string contains a specific substring or element, used here to conditionally append compiler arguments.
